Her view influenced the State Council to cancel the 'Regulations on the Management of Halal Food' project from its 2016 legislative plan.

description.zh-cn: 2017年2月，习五一指责中央电视台导演哈文修改传统民谣以迎合宗教禁忌的行为是“逆现代社会世俗化的历史潮流”。
description.en: In February 2017, Xi Wuyi criticized CCTV director Ha Wen's act of altering a traditional folk rhyme to accommodate religious taboos as 'going against the historical trend of secularization in modern society'.

description.zh-cn: 中央电视台导演哈文将传统民谣“二十六，炖猪肉”改为“二十六，炖牛肉”，此举被习五一批评为逆世俗化潮流。
description.en: CCTV director Ha Wen changed the traditional folk rhyme 'On the 26th, stew pork' to 'On the 26th, stew beef', an act criticized by Xi Wuyi as being against the trend of secularization.

description.zh-cn: 2017年5月，习五一质疑央视网直播标题“郭氏祖先是阿拉伯人后裔”违背历史学常识。
description.en: In May 2017, Xi Wuyi questioned a CCTV.com live broadcast title claiming 'The ancestors of the Guo clan are descendants of Arabs' for violating historical common sense.
